title: Am I the only one who feels really sad because I’ll never find somebody as fine as Taehyung from BTS? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your definitely not the only one. I don't just mean the whole "Awww I love Taehyung so much!" thing. I actually think I have developed a real crush on him... I don't know if this is normal... :') haha. Basically, this answer is going to be a hot mess because I'm going to try and explain what Taehyung’s doing to my goddamn feels... *clutches heart He was the biggest heart throb I had ever come across...  It's just so weird because I've always appreciated how precious Tae was as a person, but over the past 6 1/2 years my feelings toward him have become slightly stronger. Yes I loved him since they debut. I always say stuff like "I love Tae so much" but atm, it feels like I'm in that stage right before you have a legit crush on someone..   Just looking at him makes me instantly happy.  Whenever he does something adorable, I sometimes get butterflies in my stomach (gosh this is so darn cheesy... if any of my family or school friends happen to read this, pls don't judge me... )   Everything about him brings me genuine happiness and his smile brightens my day.  I don't feel lonely when I watch videos of him or the rest of the boys. I really love how much they love ARMYs because it gives the fans a chance to feel close to them even if we live halfway across the world.  I've imagined what it would be like to be in a relationship with him... but I understand that I'm never going to be his girlfriend so to make it more practical, I think of how nice it would be if one day I had a boyfriend who was like him...    I always viewed Taehyung as someone who I wanted to be ultimate best friends with (and I still do!) but after I watched this ADORABLE video, I started to really think of him as bf material... SRSLY THO, THIS IS THE CUTEST VIDEO EVER! Look at the way he looks at her! 😱😱😱  Maybe this is why I feel like I'm crushing on him... he's finally escaped my "friendzone" haha! But yeah, I've never felt this way towards an idol before; I've only ever developed crushes on people I've actually met... *Sigh* I don't even know. Maybe I'm just emotional today but writing this has made me happy. Taehyung makes me happy. I just really, really appreciate him as a person.

Honestly, I ain’t sad because it was my decision that I will never ever marry someone since I was a baby. And back to my answer, no, you’re not alone. I have met many people in real life who are complaining that they will never get someone as fine, intelligent, hardworking, kind and ideal as the BTS members ;)

I understand how you feel. Not only is Taehyung the most beautiful person ever he’s also so respectful, caring and adorable. Guys usually don’t have all these traits altogether. It’s definitely hard or even impossible to find someone like Tae. The same goes for all the members.
No, you’re not. Girl, there are probably 7289296542617773837368 girls out there who feel sad too for Taehyung, maybe even more sad than you.
